snippet: Mike Murphy, the Republican strategist who has played a critical role in getting Jeb Bush’s message out, may not end up working for Mr. Bush’s all-but-certain campaign for president, but for his “super PAC” instead.
abstract: Mike Murphy, the Republican strategist who has played a critical role in getting Jeb Bush’s message out, may not end up working for Mr. Bush’s all-but-certain campaign for president, but for his “super PAC” instead.

headline.main: Bush Adviser May Skip Campaign to Work for ‘Super PAC’
